publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-4820 Ms Maureen Watt: Ellon’s Fairtrade Status—That the Parliament congratulates the town of Ellon in Aberdeenshire on achieving Fairtrade status; notes that Ellon is the first Fairtrade town in Aberdeenshire; commends all members of the Ellon Fairtrade Town Steering Group who campaigned so successfully for Fairtrade status and the people of Ellon who have supported their efforts, and hopes that other Aberdeenshire towns will follow suit in order to help make the north east a Fairtrade region. Supported by: Christine Grahame*, Ms Sandra White*, Richard Lochhead*

S2M-4820 Ellon’s Fairtrade Status (lodged on 19 September 2006) Mrs Nanette Milne*, Chris Ballance*, Brian Adam*, Eleanor Scott*, Bruce Crawford*, Rob Gibson*, John Swinburne*, Shiona Baird*, Michael Matheson*, Frances Curran*

S2M-4820 Ms Maureen Watt: Ellon’s Fairtrade Status—That the Parliament congratulates the town of Ellon in Aberdeenshire on achieving Fairtrade status; notes that Ellon is the first Fairtrade town in Aberdeenshire; commends all members of the Ellon Fairtrade Town Steering Group who campaigned so successfully for Fairtrade status and the people of Ellon who have supported their efforts, and hopes that other Aberdeenshire towns will follow suit in order to help make the north east a Fairtrade region. Supported by: Christine Grahame, Ms Sandra White, Richard Lochhead, Mrs Nanette Milne, Chris Ballance, Brian Adam, Eleanor Scott, Bruce Crawford, Rob Gibson, John Swinburne, Shiona Baird, Michael Matheson, Frances Curran
S2M-4820 Ellon’s Fairtrade Status (lodged on 19 September 2006) Donald Gorrie*, Nora Radcliffe*, Tommy Sheridan*, Roseanna Cunningham*
S2M-4820 Ellon’s Fairtrade Status (lodged on 19 September 2006) Mr Adam Ingram*
S2M-4820 Ellon’s Fairtrade Status (lodged on 19 September 2006) Mark Ballard*
